items.sentence: I'm sure Tom will do what he promised he'd do.
Tom is serving drinks to our guests right now.
We weren't prepared for this terrorist attack.
You hope you won't have to do that, don't you?
That jacket must've cost you an arm and a leg.
I'll talk to Tom about that if you want me to.
I asked Tom if he'd like to do that on Monday.
I assured Tom that I wouldn't do that anymore.
Tom said he spent all day trying to find Mary.
Tom was a little overweight when he was a kid.
